query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZQMT043 SET ITEM = #ITEM# ,EXITEM1 = #EXITEM1# ,EXITEM2 = #EXITEM2# ,EXITEM3 = #EXITEM3# ,EXITEM4 = #EXITEM4# ,EXITEM5 = #EXITEM5# ,EXITEM6 = #EXITEM6# ,EXITEM7 = #EXITEM7# ,EXITEM8 = #EXITEM8# ,EXITEM9 = #EXITEM9# ,PARQDT = #PARQDT# ,EDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,ENAME = #G_USER_ID# WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LIFNR = #LIFNR# AND POSID = #POSID# AND ITEM = #ITEM#
